title: Normal Draft in OCE. Please.
body:
Just. Please! We've been asking for so long!
Please, it's for those people who aren't ready for ranked but are sick of not being able to ban champions

replies.body:
once its implemented...

"wow these queue times are so long riot waaaaah fix it"

draft will suck if its implemented
sick of the chat fighting that goes on when 3 people want mid
